### copyCost() {#a36730804c60ca1d41a6a15d014d67656}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned AMDGPURegisterBankInfo::copyCost (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registerbank">RegisterBank</a> &amp; A, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registerbank">RegisterBank</a> &amp; B, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize">TypeSize</a> Size) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Get the cost of a copy from <code>B</code> to <code>A</code>, or put differently, get the cost of A = COPY B.

Since register banks may cover different size, <code>Size</code> specifies what will be the size in bits that will be copied around.


:::info
Since this is a copy, both registers have the same size.
:::

</MemberDefinition>

### executeInWaterfallLoop() {#a533cd1035e03cdca3da433e98e77e430}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool AMDGPURegisterBankInfo::executeInWaterfallLoop (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder">MachineIRBuilder</a> &amp; B, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/iterator-range">iterator&#95;range</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> &gt; Range, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset">SmallSet</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a>, 4 &gt; &amp; SGPROperandRegs) const</>}>
Legalize instruction <code>MI</code> where operands in <code>OpIndices</code> must be SGPRs.

If any of the required SGPR operands are VGPRs, perform a waterfall loop to execute the instruction for each unique combination of values in all lanes in the wave. The block will be split such that rest of the instructions are moved to a new block.

Essentially performs this loop: Save Execution Mask For (Lane : Wavefront) &#123; Enable Lane, Disable all other lanes SGPR = read SGPR value for current lane from VGPR VGPRResult&#91;Lane&#93; = use&#95;op SGPR &#125; Restore Execution Mask

There is additional complexity to try for compare values to identify the unique values used.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpuregisterbankinfo-h/#l00056">56</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpuregisterbankinfo-h">AMDGPURegisterBankInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpuregisterbankinfo-cpp/#l00775">775</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpuregisterbankinfo-cpp">AMDGPURegisterBankInfo.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getBreakDownCost() {#ac390939d904c03a62f806bac6ae2626c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned AMDGPURegisterBankInfo::getBreakDownCost (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/registerbankinfo/valuemapping">ValueMapping</a> &amp; ValMapping, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registerbank">RegisterBank</a> &#42; CurBank=nullptr) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Get the cost of using <code>ValMapping</code> to decompose a register.

This is similar to <a href="#a36730804c60ca1d41a6a15d014d67656">copyCost</a>, except for cases where multiple copy-like operations need to be inserted. If the register is used as a source operand and already has a bank assigned, <code>CurBank</code> is non-null.

### getDefaultMappingSOP() {#aba8269780a1b283db0509e18d3f99d92}

### getRegBankFromRegClass() {#a53fe77055b01a82e1a53e7798cef110a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const RegisterBank &amp; AMDGPURegisterBankInfo::getRegBankFromRegClass (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterclass">TargetRegisterClass</a> &amp; RC, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt">LLT</a> Ty) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Get a register bank that covers <code>RC</code>.

<SectionUser title="Precondition">
<code>RC</code> is a user-defined register class (as opposed as one generated by <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/tablegen">TableGen</a>).
</SectionUser>


:::info
The mapping RC -&gt; RegBank could be built while adding the coverage for the register banks. However, we do not do it, because, at least for now, we only need this information for register classes that are used in the description of instruction. In other words, there are just a handful of them and we do not want to waste space.
:::


<XrefSect
  title="Todo"
  permalink="/docs/api/pages/todo/#_todo000003">
This should be <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/tablegen">TableGen</a>&#39;ed.
</XrefSect>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpuregisterbankinfo-h/#l00176">176</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpuregisterbankinfo-h">AMDGPURegisterBankInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpuregisterbankinfo-cpp/#l00287">287</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpuregisterbankinfo-cpp">AMDGPURegisterBankInfo.cpp</a>.
